name: Wild West VR
description:
Wild West VR is a first-person shooter unfolding in a western setting. Two gamepads are used as weapons. The interface is maximum smooth. Game features have been enhanced with the introduction of the waves of attacks of various levels of difficulty.Game Features
  • An artificial intelligence (AI) provides the player with a challenging battle against a virtual opponent
  • Lightweight game design that would deliver an entertaining interactive experience to the player
  • Game design shifted to controllers to make the gameplay feel natural
  • Leaderboard
